column5: When is moose season north of Pickle Lake--the village-- in NW Ontario?????? Wanting to fish in early Sept. , but don't want to bother the hunters. Thanks
Pretty sure the 17th as we plan to go the week before.
This coming from not only an outfitter but a fanatical Moose hunter,,,,,yes the season starts on the 17th of September.Good luck hunting and fishing fellas.Cheers,Eddie
